mapper.select: SELECT mr.no, mr.id, mr.pictures, mr.contents, mr.rating, mr.post_date, m.nickname FROM mealkit_review mr LEFT JOIN mealkit k ON k.no = mr.mealkit_no LEFT JOIN member m ON mr.id = m.id WHERE k.no = #{no};
SELECT mr.no, mr.id, mr.pictures, mr.contents, mr.rating, k.title, k.contents FROM mealkit_review mr LEFT JOIN mealkit k ON k.no = mr.mealkit_no WHERE mr.no = #{no};
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO mealkit_review(id, mealkit_no, pictures, contents, rating, post_date) VALUES(#{id}, #{mealkitNo}, #{pictures}, #{contents}, #{rating}, CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)
